attributes.action: Stop This Internet Black Box Scheme
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
An article in the Independent indicated to the nation that the apparently Democratic government, despite high opposition is still progressing with the scheme that will store all E-Mails and web history of every internet user in the UK. 

If we have the Democratic government we're told we have, then if enough people oppose this scheme the government will have a chance to show us that they do actually listen.

Search on the Independent website for the article as I am unable to link it here.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
